Attributes.description: Mechanisms of bacterial pathogenesis including adherence, invasion, intracellular survival, toxins, host defenses and microbial evasion strategies, antibiotics, and vaccines. Introduction to experimental approaches used to study bacterial pathogens.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: Either (a) one of MICB 211, MICB 202 and one of BIOL 201, BIOC 202, BIOC 203; or (b) BIOT 380.
